13.name: Thirst Slayer
13.description: Continuing a valiant battle against dehydration.

107.name: Trident Master
107.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a trident.

149.name: Loreclaw Expanse
149.description: Discover the secrets of Loreclaw Expanse.

167.name: Keg Recoveries
167.requirement: Recover  fumbles from your own team in Keg Brawl.

240.name: Professional Assassin
240.requirement: Kill  enemy player in rated arena games.

356.name: Rebel's Seclusion
356.description: It isn't grave robbing if they fight back, right?

357.name: Bad Neighborhood
357.description: Plug your nose and grab the goods.

465.name: Ascalonian Killer
465.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Ascalonian maps: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, and Fireheart Rise.

478.name: Orrian Killer
478.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Orr maps: Straits of Devastation, Malchor's Leap, and Cursed Shore.

486.name: Shiverpeaks Veteran Killer
486.requirement: Kill veteran or elite foes in the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

657.name: Dragon Ball Devotee
657.requirement: You're a veteran of the Dragon Ball arena.

671.name: Shipshape Cache
671.requirement: Loot the Aetherblade Cache in Fawcett's Bounty in the Harathi Hinterlands.

713.name: Kites of the Night
713.requirement: Find the large kite hidden in the Forsaken Halls in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.

766.name: Balloon Tower Tourist
766.requirement: Ascend hot-air balloon towers and claim a royal gift at the top.

771.name: Opening Ceremony Attendee
771.requirement: Attend the Opening Ceremony story instance.

863.name: Minor in Achievement
863.description: ...And complete a senior capstone project on bauble theory.

918.name: Fire and Oil
918.requirement: Put Sparki and Slick in their place.

925.name: Pirate Booty
925.description: You are a true treasure hunter.
925.requirement: Use Aether Keys to unlock 5 Aether Chests in the Twilight Assault dungeon.

1065.name: Toxic Gardener
1065.description: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1066.name: Toxic Hallucination Slayer
1066.requirement: Kill  hallucinations triggered by toxic pollen.

1114.name: Tower Watchwork Dismantler
1114.requirement: Kill  of Scarlet's twisted watchwork minions.

1138.name: Tower Hybrid Master
1138.requirement: Defeat the toxic hybrid without any party members dying.

1152.name: Fractal Fortnight: Swampland
1152.description: Shifting trees won't stop you. The Mossman will.
1152.requirement: You've completed the Swampland fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1179.name: Toxic Alliance Slayer
1179.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1241.name: Aftermath Toxic Gardener IV
1241.requirement: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1262.name: Winter Wonderland Winner
1262.description: Make a run for some holiday cheer.
1262.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle.

1352.name: Boss Thumper XXIII
1352.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1401.name: Fort Marriner Fighter
1401.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1401.requirement: Completely retake Fort Marriner and its surrounding areas.

1521.name: He'll Never Live This Down
1521.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1521.requirement: Locate Peter the Lost during the retaking of Lion's Arch.

1690.name: Birthday—Year 10
1690.description: You have a character that is more than 10 years old.

1822.name: Tangled Paths
1822.requirement: Track the Aspect Masters across the Maguuma Wastes.

1835.name: Go for the Gold
1835.requirement: Find all the golden lost badges hidden throughout the Silverwastes.

bits.text: Golden Lost Badge #1
Golden Lost Badge #2

1888.name: Daily Goemm's Lab Jumping Puzzle
1888.requirement: Complete the Goemm's Lab jumping puzzle in Metrica Province.

1940.name: Daily Caledon Forest Event Completer
1940.requirement: Complete events in Caledon Forest in the Maguuma Jungle.

1983.name: Daily Shatterer
1983.requirement: Defeat the Shatterer in Lowland Burns of the Blazeridge Steppes.

1984.name: Daily Shiverpeaks Miner
1984.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
1984.requirement: Gather raw materials by mining ore in the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

2066.name: Dive Master: Drydock Scratch
2066.requirement: Find and use a diving location in Drydock Scratch.

2165.name: Raised the Bar
2165.requirement: Participate in raising the security level at night while fully eligible.

2239.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 27
2239.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2280.name: The Predator III: The Hunter
2280.description: One hunts by stealth and slyness, and one targets only the most valuable prey. Show your ability to stalk your prey and use the knowledge gained as you craft the legendary precursor The Hunter.

bits.text: Successfully make it through the stealth gauntlet in Tawny Ridge in Blazeridge Steppes.
Open the treasure chest at the end of the Obsidian Sanctum while in stealth from the stealth fountain.
Purchase from Kyra Sharptracker near Victor's Presidium in the Plains of Ashford after helping her thin out the ghosts.
Purchase from Scout Variloo at Mirror's Handle in Malchor's Leap after stopping the risen Hylek.
Disguise yourself as a Separatist and attack the Flame Legion hideout in the Oldgate Clearing of Diessa Plateau.
Disguise yourself as a Flame Legion soldier and attack the Separatist camp in the Oldgate Clearing of Diessa Plateau.
Win a duel while disguised as a Nightmare Court sylvari in the Briarthorn Den of Caledon Forest.
Kill Taidha Covington of Laughing Gull Island in Bloodtide Coast.
Kill Chief Otyugh in Fields of Ruin.
Kill Stravig the Defender of Foulbear Kraal in Fields of Ruin.
Kill Drakin Cinderspire in the Scorchlands of Iron Marches.
Kill Victurus the Shattered in the Crystalwept Groves in Iron Marches.
Kill Draithor the Drill in the Blackroot Cut of Kessex Hills.
Kill Captain Wiley on the Newbeach Bluffs in Gendarran Fields.
Kill Modniir Ulgoth in the Modniir Gorge of Harathi Hinterlands.
Kill the Terror-Seven Krewe Leader found in the Benthic Kelp Beds of Mount Maelstrom.
Kill the Infinity Coil Commander in Mount Maelstrom.
Kill the Svanir Shaman Chief at the Heart of Corruption in Wayfarer Foothills.
Kill the Dredge Commissar of Tribulation Rift in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Kill Champion Frainn, and put a stop to the Mighty Oouo in Timberline Falls.
Defeat Queen Chrii'kkt IV in Dry Top.
Kill the Krait Blood Witch of Viathan Lake in Kessex Hills.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2293.name: Nuhoch Lane Defender
2293.requirement: Successfully participate in the Nuhoch lane for the entirety of the King of the Jungle battle.

2332.name: Machined Longbow
2332.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Longbow.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2385.name: Master Daredevil
2385.requirement: Completely train the thief's daredevil elite specialization.

2454.name: Machined Rifle
2454.requirement: Collect all  items to forge your Machined Rifle.

bits.text: Purchased from Itzel vendors for airship parts.
Purchased from Exalted vendors for aurillium.
Purchased from Nuhoch vendors for ley-line crystals.
Charge an oiled weapon component at a place of power in the Heart of Maguuma.
Found in Noxious Pods in Dragon's Stand.

2467.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 18
2467.requirement: Complete  scale 18 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2537.name: Avoid Traps
2537.requirement: Find Taimi without stepping on any Mordrem traps.

2556.name: HOPE III: Prototype
2556.description: As the hylek are masters of alchemy, so too are the asura the wizards of technomagical research. They understand the forces in play in their Eternal Alchemy and how to apply them to the greater world. Uncover their secrets in your work to attain Prototype, the next step in your legendary journey for attaining HOPE.

bits.text: Take the five reactor components to the Snaff Memorial Lab in Rata Sum, and use the Synergetics Workstation to create the Experimental Reactor.
A reactor component looted from the chest after defeating the Fire Elemental located in the Thaumanova Reactor of Metrica Province.
A reactor component looted from the chest after defeating Inquest Golem Mark II in Mount Maelstrom.
A reactor component found in the chest at the end of the Uncategorized Fractal.
A reactor component gathered from looting the Inquest Experimental Aspect Suit in Dry Top.
A reactor component looted from the chest at the end of the Captain Mai Trin Boss Fractal.
Found in the chest at the end of the Thaumanova Reactor Fractal.
Recipe offered for purchase by Kamma after successfully helping her test her experimental weapon at the United Arcanist Lab in Sparkfly Fen.
Found by looting the Champion Infinity Coil Commander in Mount Maelstrom.
Purchase from Lightbringer Krentch after successfully helping the Order of Whispers sabotage Inquest weapon tests on the hylek village of Tzanopl Grounds in Mount Maelstrom.
Collect the five crystal charges to energize the Empty Branded Crystal.
Found in the chest after defeating the Shatterer in Blazeridge Steppes.
Use the Empty Branded Crystal to gain a crystal charge near Omadd's Machine at the Cavern of the Shining Lights in Dry Top.
Use the Empty Branded Crystal to gain a crystal charge inside the chak nest near the Ley-Line Node in Tangled Depths.
Use the Empty Branded Crystal to gain a crystal charge near the chest at the end of the Chaos Crystal Cavern in Iron Marches.
Use the Empty Branded Crystal to gain a crystal charge near the chest of the foundry under Darkweather Rise in Sparkfly Fen.
Use the Empty Branded Crystal to gain a crystal charge after earning rank silver or better in the Ley-Line Run adventure in Tangled Depths.
Found in the chest in the depths of Cubular Fells in Mount Maelstrom.
Purchase the recipe for the Unstable Energy Concoction from Atlalli the Master Alchemist in the Hunting Banks of Timberline Falls.
Gathered by earning a rank of silver or better in the Wings of Gold adventure in Auric Basin.
Gathered by looting the Champion Gold Ooze inside the cave at Westwatch Patch in Auric Basin.
Occasionally looted from veteran chak lobbers in Tangled Depths.
Gathered from a Nuhoch Spittoon near the Hero Challenge at Stonetwist Paths in Verdant Brink.

Take the Perplexing Energized Cube, the Perpetual Energy Coil, Alkaline Solution, and the Thaumanova Anomaly Spark  to the Snaff Memorial Lab in Rata Sum and use the Synergetics Workstation to create the Synergetic Generator.
Take the Synergetic Generator to Sparkfly Fen and test the energy reactions near the chest after defeating Tequatl the Sunless.
Take the Synergetic Generator to Goemm's Lab in Metrica Provice and test the energy reactions near the chest after defeating Goemm the Mad.

Take the Synergetic Generator to the abandoned mine in Dry Top and attempt to sabotage the Inquest Synergetics Panel. After defeating the Inquest Synergetics Expert, use the device to test the energy reactions in the area.
Take the Synergetic Generator to Maelstrom's Core in Mount Maelstrom and test the energy reactions near the chest after defeating the Megadestroyer.
Take the Synergetic Generator to Auric Basin and test the energy reactions after gaining a rank of silver or better in the adventure A Fungus Among Us.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Historian of the Armaments ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2558.name: Flying Circus: Silver
2558.requirement: Glide through the glowing rings and reach the finish line as fast as possible!

2591.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 39
2591.requirement:
Complete the fractal dungeon at this difficulty in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.
Requires the mastery Follows Advice.

2753.name: Mystic Essence Collector—Champion
2753.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension III: Monument of Legends.
2753.requirement: Obtain by combining the following items in the Mystic Forge: Essence of Discipline, 20 Armored Scales, 50 Large Scales, and 250 Dragonite Ore.

2843.name: Course Load
2843.requirement: Complete the Course Work achievement eight times over the course of the Super Adventure Festival. The Course Work achievement is located in the Super Adventure Box: Daily tab.

2845.name: Mineral Resource Extraction 201
2845.requirement: Dig up three bauble chests in World 2, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2856.name: Color Guard
2856.requirement: Reach each of the flags in the lobby of Super Adventure Box.

bits.text: Flag 1
Flag 2
Flag 3
Flag 4

2893.name: Daily Ascalonian Catacombs
2893.requirement: Complete any path in the Ascalonian Catacombs explorable dungeon.

2991.name: Daily Tier 2 Thaumanova Reactor
2991.requirement: Complete Thaumanova Reactor at fractal scale 26 or higher.

3140.name: Colossal Defense
3140.requirement: Defeat  enemy while defending your team's capture points during rated Eternal Coliseum matches.

3143.name: Coliseum of Glory
3143.description: Lion or Dragon? Which will be victorious?
3143.requirement: Earn glory in the Eternal Coliseum by completing these achievements.

3149.name: Mistlock Mountaineer
3149.description: Scale the rocks to the tree-topped outcrop.

3155.name: Death to the Undying
3155.requirement: Defeat the Skeletal Lich in Mad King's Labyrinth.

3173.name: Dive Master: Cold Feet
3173.requirement: Find and use a diving location in the Bitter Cold.

3329.name: Upper City Security Chief
3329.description: Story Instance: A Meeting of Ministers
3329.requirement: Revive guards in the Upper City.

3371.name: Legacy of Death
3371.requirement: Defeat  player during Legacy of the Foefire rated matches.

3393.name: The Crimson Assassin
3393.requirement: Unlock all  Crimson Assassin weapon skins in your wardrobe.

3456.name: A Quick Death
3456.description:
Story Instance: The Last Chance

"The only mercy left for you is a quick death."
3456.requirement: Achieve victory within nine minutes of starting the final battle.

3470.name: The Last Chance
3470.requirement: Help the Shining Blade finish what they started.

3501.name: Bloodtide Coast Insight: Bloody Bill's Base
3501.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Bloodtide Coast.

3573.name: Desolation Insight: Sandfall Sanctum
3573.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desolation.

3646.name: Necropolis Supply Run: Gold
3646.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Necropolis Supply Run adventure.

3653.name: Ziadih the Fearless
3653.requirement: Defeat the water djinn Ziadih the Fearless.

3693.name: Skimshallow Cove Supply Run: Silver
3693.requirement: Gather supplies for the ranch hands of Skimmer Ranch quickly!

3699.name: Ghostly Trio
3699.description: Centuries ago, three heroes guided the Chosen through the Trials of Ascension. When Augury Rock is compromised, they will journey to the Throne of Pellentia to meet their leader, Turai Ossa.
3699.requirement: Follow the three ghostly heroes through each step of their return path, and meet their leader.

3744.name: Just a Sip
3744.requirement: Convince Master Chef Laraib in Amnoon that you are a worthy sous-chef.

3779.name: Daily Desolation Bounty Hunter
3779.requirement: Complete a bounty in the Desolation.

3899.name: War God's Weapon Collection
3899.requirement: Unlock all War God's weapons in your wardrobe.

3923.name: New Afterlife for Quaggan
3923.requirement: Donate enough pieces of candy corn to give Drooburt a new start.

3938.name: Mad Memories
3938.requirement: Speak with Magister Tassi in Lion's Arch about researching the Mad King's life and death.

4049.name: Winter Wonderland Mastery
4049.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle  time.

4191.name: Desert King Weapon Collection
4191.requirement: Unlock all Desert King weapon skins in your wardrobe.

4261.name: Domain of Kourna Insight: Ntouka Pond
4261.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in the Domain of Kourna.

4270.name: Beetle Feed
4270.description: The fastest way to a roller beetle's heart is through its proventriculus. —Gorrik
4270.requirement: Collect  roller beetle foods and feed Petey the perfect meal.

bits.text: Contain scarab outbreaks in the Domain of Kourna.
Smash plague experiments in the Moon Fortress.
Drops from junundu wurms in the Crystal Desert.
Harvested from the Alpha Beetle in the Far Silverwastes.
Purchased from the heket in the Domain of Kourna.
Harvested from cave wurms in the Domain of Kourna.
Harvested from the toxic spider queen in Kessex Hills.
Give Petey the perfect meal.

4298.name: High Stakes Gambler
4298.requirement: Win  third tier matches with five active gambits.

4376.name: The Convergence of Sorrow I: Elegy
4376.description: <c=@Flavor>It can take a lifetime to learn how to live.</c>
4376.requirement: Console an Awakened armorsmith and change the heart of a Sunspear.
4376.locked_text: Complete Chapter 5 of Episode 4 to unlock this collection.

bits.text: Find the Awakened armorsmith in Sun's Refuge.
Find one of the armorsmith's monuments in Jahai.
Investigate the monuments' destruction.
Return to the armorsmith.
Find Second Spear Riyid.
Listen to the Sunspear's fellow soldiers.
Find something left behind at an old homestead.
Find something else left behind at an old homestead.
Find the former Sunspear.
Bring an idea, and two memories, to the armorsmith.
A memorial among wurms and bones.
A memorial overlooking what flows and what grows.
A memorial preceding prosperity.
A memorial of secrets beside an ancient arch.
A memorial where a general meets an old foe anew.
A memorial where a tyrant rose.
Two memorials where one was destroyed.
Find the destroyer.
Where all things come together.

4378.name: In Tatters; Not Shattered
4378.requirement: Rescue every Free Awakened inside the Fortress of Jahai during the Death-Branded Shatterer's attack.

4382.name: Daily Jahai Bluffs Displaced Tower Jumping Puzzle
4382.requirement: Complete the displaced tower jumping puzzle.

4393.name: Pod Smasher
4393.description:
Branded pods are not edible.

Story Instance: Legacy
4393.requirement: Defeat the Branded Riftstalker without any Branded pods detonating.

4427.name: Finders Inner Keepers
4427.description: Archon Iberu's ill-gotten gains are a matter of legend.
4427.requirement: Be one of the first three to reach Iberu's treasure in the Inner Keep of Jahai Fortress.

4456.name: Powers of the Djinn
4456.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that gains one of Yasmi's powers and wins the match in Djinn's Dominion rated matches  time.

4478.name: Daily Racer: Infernal Leap
4478.requirement: Complete laps of the roller beetle race in Mount Maelstrom. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4607.name: Chasing Tales: Belitrea the Blade of Want
4607.requirement: Acquire a Dragonsblood dagger and perform tasks to re-create Belitrea's legend.

bits.text: Acquire the tome entry Chasing Tales: Belitrea the Blade of Want.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Belitrea: deed #1.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Belitrea: deed #2.
Acquire the heroic spirit of Belitrea: deed #3.
Meet with the spirit of Belitrea at a heroic font.

4615.name: Chasing Tales: Dinner Party
4615.description: It's a party, and everyone's invited.
4615.requirement: Strike 20 foes from behind with daggers in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Learned of Belitrea the Blade of Want.
Struck 20 foes from behind with daggers in Thunderhead Peaks.

4790.name: Scholar of Ahdashim
4790.description: To achieve true understanding, one must seek knowledge from many sources.
4790.requirement: Read every book in The Key of Ahdashim raid instance.

bits.text: Secrets of the Ley Line
Qadim's Menagerie
Ahdashim Royal Decrees
High Court Precedent
The Original Four
Proposal for Renovations to Ahdashim

4849.name: Zhaitasty
4849.requirement: Consume zhaitaffy, the official candy of Dragon Bash.

4862.name: (Annual) Pirate Purger
4862.requirement: Kill  pirate in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4981.name: A Carved Path
4981.requirement: Uncover the secrets of the Ash camp.

5069.name: Rimed Verdant Weapons
5069.requirement: Unlock all  Rimed Verdant weapon skins in your wardrobe.

5150.name: First Foods Crafted
5150.description: Never go adventuring on an empty stomach.

5163.name: Just Getting Started
5163.requirement: Reach level 10 with one character on your account.

5168.name: League Participator—2v2 Season One
5168.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 2v2 Season One.

5170.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Twenty-One
5170.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-One.

5172.name: Use a Tiny Sharpening Stone
5172.description: Giving you the edge you need to claim victory.
5172.requirement: Use a Tiny Sharpening Stone purchased from low-level karma merchants in Plains of Ashford, Wayfarer Foothills, Queensdale, Caledon Forest, and Metrica Province.

5183.name: Visions of the Past: Retake Cragstead
5183.description: Having received no support from Rytlock or Eir, Braham enlists your help to retake his village from the Molten Alliance. [This mission is now playable in Living World Season 1: Episode 1]

5230.name: Mission Challenge: Powerful Foes
5230.requirement: Complete the Forging Steel vision with the Powerful Foes challenge active.

5276.name: Daily Drizzlewood Coast Device Repairer
5276.requirement: Repair  listening devices in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5359.name: Beach Cleanup
5359.requirement: Eliminate all hostile Dominion forces from the beach area.

5367.name: Steamy Selection
5367.requirement: Find the latest masterwork by celebrated author Snargle Goldclaw.

5413.name: Skyscale Rider: Drizzlewood Coast
5413.requirement: Complete all of the Reality Rifts in the Drizzlewood Coast.

5472.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Twenty-Four
5472.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Four.

5479.name: Daily Crystal Bloom Donations
5479.requirement: Donate needed materials to the Crystal Bloom.

5599.name: Daily Thunderhead Keep Dragon Response Mission
5599.requirement: Complete the Thunderhead Keep Dragon Response Mission.

5710.name: Skritt Hot
5710.requirement: During the Dragonstorm encounter, dodge Primordus's Apocalypse Rain attack  time.

5754.name: Return to No Refuge
5754.requirement: Complete the mission No Refuge in Living World Season 2 Episode 7.

5795.name: Return to Shining Blade Headquarters
5795.requirement: Complete the mission Shining Blade Headquarters in Living World Season 3 Episode 6.

5856.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Twenty-Eight
5856.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Eight.

5936.name: Crop Harvester: Bjora Marches
5936.requirement: Harvest plants  times in Bjora Marches.

5963.name: Revenge of Vemyen
5963.requirement: Defeat the legendary Branded djinn in Jahai Bluffs.

5966.name: Revenge of the Dragons
5966.requirement: Defeat Primordus and Jormag  time in the Dragonstorm encounter.

5975.name: Return to Tracking the Scientist
5975.requirement: Complete the story mission Tracking the Scientist in Living World Season 4 Episode 2.

5976.name: Crop Harvester: Domain of Istan
5976.requirement: Harvest plants  times in the Domain of Istan.

5990.name: Parallel Analysis
5990.requirement: After completing the meta-achievement Return to Dragonfall, visit Taimi and Gorrik at the Eye of the North.

6005.name: Return to the Domain of Kourna
6005.requirement: Complete  Return to Long Live the Lich achievements.

6007.name: Return to Cave of the Sunspear Champion
6007.requirement: Complete the story mission Cave of the Sunspear Champion in Living World Season 4 Episode 1.

6107.name: Read "The Secret of the Vault"
6107.requirement: Read "The Secret of the Vault," found throughout the sunken ruins of Old Kaineng.

bits.text: Book of Yuhwa and Dalnim 1
Book of Yuhwa and Dalnim 2
Book of Yuhwa and Dalnim 3
Book of Yuhwa and Dalnim 4
Book of Yuhwa and Dalnim 5
Book of Yuhwa and Dalnim 6
Book of Yuhwa and Dalnim 7
Book of Yuhwa and Dalnim 8
Book of Yuhwa and Dalnim 9

6165.name: A Blooming Errand
6165.description: "My flowers are like children. They need love...coddling. Like all good things, they take time and attention."—Ju

bits.text: Find an alpine lily in Snowden Drifts.
Find a yellow gentian flower in the Fields of Ruin.
Find a pungent gladiolus in the Wayfarer Foothills.
Assist Researcher Yon in Seitung Province to receive crimson sunflowers.

6212.name: Daily Echovald Wilds Event Completer
6212.requirement: Complete events in the Echovald Wilds.

6256.name: Not-So-Peaceful Shrine
6256.description: No, really, they'll get it next time!
6256.requirement: Defeat each of the enemies that is summoned in the ritual at the shrine to Hanuku.

6266.name: Dive Bar
6266.requirement: Complete a dive near the Green Grotto in Dragon's End.

6417.name: Ministry-Approved Catalyst
6417.requirement: Purchase these  trinkets from the strike rewards vendor.

6421.name: Sticky Fingers
6421.requirement: Deposit 5 blobs of sap in a row without getting hit by grub attacks during the last Forever Tree event.

6452.name: Speakers Saboteur
6452.requirement: Sabotage the Speakers to acquire intel on Ankka.

6480.name: Master Willbender
6480.requirement: Completely train the guardian's willbender elite specialization.

6501.name: Daily Ascalon Fisher
6501.description: Fueling the engines of the economy.
6501.requirement: Gather raw materials by catching fish in the following locations: Plains of Ashford, Diessa Plateau, Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Iron Marches, or Fireheart Rise.

6662.name: Looting Enemies
6662.requirement:
Loot  defeated enemies.

<c=@reminder>Sometimes enemies will drop items when defeated, indicated by a golden sparkle around their body. Interact with these enemies to loot these items and add them to your inventory.</c>

6677.name: Entering World vs. World
6677.requirement:
Enter  World vs. World map.

<c=@reminder>Storm castles and conquer territories in World vs. World! Enter the Mists from Eternal Battlegrounds asura gates in Lion's Arch, which can be traveled to from major cities, or by clicking the castle icon in the top-left corner of your screen.</c>

6746.name: Discovering Waypoints II
6746.requirement:
Discover 5 waypoints in in the Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, or the Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>Waypoints allow you to travel quickly around the world. They are unlocked by visiting them once. You can teleport to any unlocked waypoint for a small amount of coin.</c>

6761.name: Kraitmare Averted
6761.requirement: Defeat the Toxic Oratuss within the time limit.

6892.name: League Participator—2v2 Season Nine
6892.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Nine.

6952.name: Silent Surf Fractal
6952.requirement: Complete all the achievements associated with the Silent Surf fractal.

6959.name: League Slayer—Conquest Season Thirty-Eight
6959.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Eight.

6966.name: Amnytas Insight: The Debate Hall
6966.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Amnytas.

6982.name: Wizard's Tower: Skyscale Target Practice—Silver
6982.requirement: Earn a silver medal or better in the Wizard's Tower: Skyscale Target Practice adventure.

6996.name: Tangled Depths Incursions
6996.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in the Tangled Depths.

7067.name: Straits of Devastation Incursions
7067.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in the Straits of Devastation.

7106.name: Chuck Out the Trash
7106.description: The clouds above Amnytas stir awake. Is it rain that hits the brim of my helm, or...drool?
7106.requirement: Defeat an intrusion from beyond the Mists.

7141.name: Skyscale Medicine Masker
7141.requirement: Collect  pieces of meat from hunting jungle wurms. World boss and champion wurms will give significantly more meat.

7216.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: Under the Dunes
7216.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7230.name: Diving Goggles: Free Fall of New Kaineng
7230.description: Fall down into the water while watching the downfall of New Kaineng.
7230.requirement: Use the diving goggles to jump off an island overlooking the Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03 dam.

7512.name: Dungeon Delver: Citadel of Flame
7512.requirement: Complete any path of the Citadel of Flame dungeon.

7708.name: Inner Nayos Insight: Mourning's Shade
7708.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Inner Nayos.

7716.name: Jump Start: Meeting the Mist Stranger
7716.requirement: Speak with the Mist Stranger in your homeland and hear their request.

7822.name: Inner Nayos: The Old Settlement Savior
7822.description: Sabotaging loyalists and satiating allies—a win-win scenario!
7822.requirement: Successfully complete unique events in the Old Settlement in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Wreak havoc in the Fortress of the Founding.
Use your skyscale to pick food and deliver it to the starving Kryptis.

7853.name: Itching for a Fight
7853.requirement: Help Major Emund and Reya defeat the loyalists in the Fortress of the Founding.

7927.name: Legendary Illusionist
7927.requirement: Win  rated arena game as a mesmer.

7941.name: (Annual) World 3 Testing
7941.description: For when you're up for something new, even if it's a little rough.

7953.name: Whiteside Ridge Veteran
7953.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

7956.name: Drakkar Lake Veteran
7956.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

7968.name: Event Collection: Citadel of Zakiros
7968.description: Going down the spires, but hopefully not getting downed.
7968.requirement: Complete event collection achievements around the Citadel of Zakiros.

7994.name: Piken Square Veteran
7994.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8059.name: Skyscale Target Practice in Amnytas: Master
8059.description: This is the advanced course that Livia prepared you for when you defended those relics.
8059.requirement: Finish the Skyscale Target Practice in Amnytas adventure with all targets destroyed.

8066.name: Augury Rock Veteran
8066.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8069.name: Big Mood
8069.description: The smell of Zakiros alone is probably enough to cause despair.
8069.requirement: Gather  emotional attunements while fighting Karax or Eparch in the Citadel of Zakiros.

8077.name: Convergence Challenge Mode—Sorrow: Gold
8077.requirement: Earn gold-rank timing in a Convergence with challenge mode active for this legendary creature.

8083.name: Arborstone Veteran
8083.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8102.name: Saltspray Survived
8102.requirement: Defeat a saltspray dragon at difficulty 3 in Dragon Arena (Private).

8108.name: Sunken Treasure Week: Kessex Hills
8108.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
8108.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Kessex Hills.

8173.name: Life in the Lowlands
8173.requirement: Read all the books scattered around Lowland Shore.

bits.text: Echoes of Night's Sightings
The Queen of the Bog
Master of the Spear by Snargle Goldclaw
Stung by Love by Snargle Goldclaw
Overfeeding!
The Fleshstalkers
Demise of the Deep Crawler
A Bearkin Guide to Celestial Bodies
Letter from Dagonet
Graced by Fire's Wild Journeykin Observations
Still, Cold Winds
Silken Weir
Village Notice
Field Research Notes
Janthir Field Notes: Troll Cave
Ink-Smudged Letter
Gold-Trimmed Journal, Page 1
Gold-Trimmed Journal, Page 2
Gold-Trimmed Journal, Page 3
Curious Artifact
Dragon Parentage and Family
From Pirate to Pilot
The Ravaging of the Jade Runner

8203.name: Don't Drop That
8203.description: Better in the trash than on the floor.
8203.requirement: Complete the "Collect and turn in debris from the shore and enemies" event without dropping any debris.

8220.name: Lowland Shore Insight: Waterfall Roost
8220.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Lowland Shore.

8229.name: Event Collection: Southeast Janthir Syntri
8229.requirement:
Participate in successful events around Forager's Hunt, River's Maw, and Storm's Border.

(Some events can count toward multiple achievements.)

bits.text: Investigate Forager's Hunt for hidden enemies.
Defend the kodan base from the Mistburned creatures.
Help the kodan prepare for their expedition by distributing supplies. (Event 1 of 2)
Follow Guiding Star and their team on the expedition. (Event 2 of 2)
Clear Rising Bloom's garden of Mistburned flowers.
Help the kodan gather foraged plants and animal meat.

8316.name: Lowland Shore Rift Hunting
8316.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Janthir Wilds.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

8359.name: Janthir Syntri Insight: Sulfurous Climb
8359.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Janthir Syntri.

8370.name: Local Response: Domain of Istan (Weekly)
8370.requirement: Complete  events in the Domain of Istan.

8374.name: Revenge of Kuda (Weekly)
8374.requirement: Defeat the Inquest's champions in the Specimen Chamber.

8376.name: Local Response: Domain of Vabbi
8376.requirement: Complete  events in Domain of Vabbi. Bounty events award additional progress.

8379.name: Adventurous Spirit: Sandswept Isles (Weekly)
8379.requirement: Complete any adventure in the Sandswept Isles.

8436.name: Foefire Weapon Collection
8436.requirement: Unlock all  Foefire weapon skins in your wardrobe.

8523.name: Adventurous Spirit: Flight of the Eagle Spirit (Weekly)
8523.requirement: Complete the Flight of the Eagle Spirit adventure in Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

8578.name: Mistburned Barrens Rift Hunting
8578.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Mistburned Barrens.

bits.text: Tier 1 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 2 Rift Hunt Target
Tier 3 Rift Hunt Target

8761.name: Unknown Nightmares: Experiments in the Shadows
8761.requirement: Help a scientist reach out into the Mists, and hope that the Mists don't reach back.

bits.text: Talk to Jorvik Jorundsson in Bava Nisos to learn how you can help further their research.

Complete the "Collect lightning to keep the asura turrets charged" event in Mistburned Barrens or the "Collect jars, fill them with lightning, and deposit them in the drop-off locations" event in Janthir Syntri to charge the battery.
Return to Jorvik Jorundsson in Bava Nisos and give him the battery.
Travel to Godslost Swamp and find the suspicious portal to calibrate Jorvik Jorundsson's sensor.
Talk to Jorvik Jorundsson in Bava Nisos to give him his sensor back.
Complete the Chaos Crystal Cavern jumping puzzle in Iron Marches to find an appropriate crystal.
Talk to Jorvik Jorundsson in Bava Nisos to verify the crystal is appropriate for their purposes.
Use the scrying pool in the Hall of Monuments to attune the crystal to become a vessel.
Talk to Jorvik Jorundsson in Bava Nisos to give him the attuned crystal.
Talk to a shadowy being through their crystal mirror in Bava Nisos to acquire their blessing.
